item.description:
$9 Movie Tuesdays -The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (2012) in 3D -Please get tickets at 6:00PM. --Movie Start time 6:15PM.  We still meet at 6:00PM in Lobby to go in at 6:05PM to get good seats. Most seats are all new and very comfy!!

The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (2012) in 3D: Details: A curious Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, journeys to the Lonely Mountain with a vigorous group of Dwarves to reclaim a treasure stolen from them by the dragon Smaug.

--------------------------------------------------

This looks like a great movie not to be missed on the Big Screen! So take a break from your work week and watch this great movie with us, some of your new pals. This movie looks great for 2012..... It’s time to see a great movie so do not miss out! You can't beat $9 in 3D!

Location: Showcase Cinemas Woburn 25 Middlesex Canal Parkway, Woburn, MA.

Meet in the lobby. Walk into the lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note there is one on the right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables. This is so we have an exact spot to meet.

Ciao Biagio

-------------------------------------------------------------

Note: There is NO pre Movie dinner at Tudo Na Brasa 414 Main St Woburn, MA at 6 PM. Please do NOT sign up for this dinner  seperately.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby. Walk into lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note: NOT the one on right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables.
item.name: $9 Movie Tuesdays - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (2012) in 3D
